ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors sincerely appreciate financial supports (MOST106–2221-E-197–020-MY3, 106–2923-E-197–002-MY3, 106–2621-M-197–001, 107–2621-M-197–001 and 109–2221-E-197–016-MY3) form the Taiwan's Ministry of Science and Technology (MOST) for the project of Microbial Fuel Cells (MFCs) sdg conducted in Biochemical Engineering Laboratory, C&ME NIU. The authors also sincerely thank anonymous reviewers for their comments of great significance.
